title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2162/98 of 7 October 1998 repealing Regulation (EC) No 1119/98 relating to the invitation to tender for the export of barley held by the Finnish intervention agency
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2162/98 of 7 October 1998 repealing Regulation (EC) No 1119/98 relating to the invitation to tender for the export of barley held by the Finnish intervention agency
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1119/98 is hereby repealed.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 October 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 181, 1. 7. 1992, p. 21.
(2) OJ L 126, 24. 5. 1996, p. 37.
(3) OJ L 191, 31. 7. 1993, p. 76.
(4) OJ L 293, 16. 11. 1996, p. 1.
(5) OJ L 157, 30. 5. 1998, p. 54.
